prompts: Create a fluffy, white Pokemon that resembles a dog with elegant fur and a playful demeanor.
Imagine a Normal-type Pokemon known for its stylish hairstyles and grooming habits.
Show me a Pokemon that has a sleek, quadruped body with a friendly expression and a love for urban environments.
Generate a unique Pokemon with a cloud-like appearance and a penchant for social interactions with trainers.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in grassy areas, displaying distinctive fur patterns and a cheerful personality.
Give me a Pokemon that features a high-maintenance grooming style and a playful attitude towards battles.
Make a Normal-type Pokemon with thick, luxurious fur that can change styles to fit its mood.
